question: Statement - I: Reduction of ester by DIBAL-H followed by hydrolysis gives aldehyde.
Statement - II: Oxidation of benzyl alcohol with aqueous <katex>$KMnO_{4}$</katex> leads to the formation to Benzaldehyde.
Among the above statements, identify the correct statement.
choices: Both statements - I and II are false
Statement - I is true but statement - II is false
Statement - I is false but statement - II is true
Both statements - I and II are true
explanation: Statement I is True: DIBAL-H selectively reduces esters to aldehydes.
Statement II is False: Strong oxidizing agents like <katex>$KMnO_4$</katex> oxidize primary alcohols (like benzyl alcohol) directly to carboxylic acids (Benzoic acid), not stopping at aldehyde.
